Monologue.Current: “Test”
Monologue.Original: “Test”

Monologue.Current: “Добро пожаловать!{Line} Ваш любимый столик свободен.”
Monologue.Original: “Welcome!{Line} Your usual table is ready.”

Monologue.Current: (Я сперва немного прогуляюсь.){Line}(Отлично, мы на месте!){Line}{Color Grey}(А? Простите?){Color White}
Monologue.Original: (I’ll walk around a bit first.){Line}(Alright, I’m there!){Line}{Color Grey}(Huh? Excuse me?){Color White}

Monologue.Current: {Color Grey}(What the...!){Color White}
Monologue.Original: {Color Grey}(What the...!){Color White}

Monologue.Current: (Я сперва немного прогуляюсь.){Line}(Давайте присядем.){Line}{Color Grey}(Да что такое?!){Color White}
Monologue.Original: (I’ll walk around a bit first.){Line}(Let’s take a load off.){Line}{Color Grey}(What is this?){Color White}

Monologue.Current: {Color Grey}(What is this?){Color White}
Monologue.Original: {Color Grey}(What is this?){Color White}

Monologue.Current: {Char Laguna}{Line}“Я немного прогуляюсь.”
Monologue.Original: Laguna{Line}“I’m gonna walk around.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Laguna}{Line}“Благодарю.”
Monologue.Original: Laguna{Line}“Thanks.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Laguna}{Line}“А?”
Monologue.Original: Laguna{Line}“Huh?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Laguna}{Line}“Что?”
Monologue.Original: Laguna{Line}“What?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Kiros}{Line}“Что-то не так?”
Monologue.Original: Kiros{Line}“What’s wrong?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Laguna}{Line}“Я... не знаю.”
Monologue.Original: Laguna{Line}“I... I dunno.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Laguna}{Line}“Не знаю...”
Monologue.Original: Laguna{Line}“Ahh... I’m not quite sure.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Ward}{Line}“Минутку...{Line} У тебя тоже в башке шумит?”
Monologue.Original: Ward{Line}“Wait a second...{Line} Is your head buzzing...?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Laguna}{Line}“И у тебя?!”
Monologue.Original: Laguna{Line}“W-What... You, too?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Ward}{Line}“Ага. Ещё с Тимбера.”
Monologue.Original: Ward{Line}“Yeah, ever since we were in Timber.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Kiros}{Line}“И у меня...”
Monologue.Original: Kiros{Line}“Me, too...”

Monologue.Current: Ward{Line}“Да мы просто устали, вот и всё!{Line} Нам полегчает после рюмки,{Line} или двух, или, может, трёх...”
Monologue.Original: Ward{Line}“Hey, we’re just tired, that’s all. We’ll{Line} be fine after a drink or two, or three...”

Monologue.Current: // После третьей реплики в мыслях{Line}{Char Laguna}{Line}“ЗАТКНИСЬ ПОЖАЛУЙСТА!!!”
Monologue.Original: Laguna{Line}“Just shut up, PU-LEASE!!!”

Monologue.Current: {Color Grey}(Это сон?..){Color White}
Monologue.Original: {Color Grey}(Is this a dream...?){Color White}

Monologue.Current: {Color Grey}(А Лагуна симпатяшка!){Color White}
Monologue.Original: {Color Grey}(Laguna’s pretty cute!){Color White}

Monologue.Current: {Color Grey}(Что происходит?!{Line} Что со мной творится?!){Color White}
Monologue.Original: {Color Grey}(What’s goin’ on!?{Line} W-What’s happening to me!?){Color White}

Monologue.Current: {Char Laguna}{Line}“Вольно, парни.”
Monologue.Original: Laguna{Line}“At ease, men.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Laguna}{Line}“Сегодня ночью мы выложимся по полной!”
Monologue.Original: Laguna{Line}“We’re goin’ all out tonight, right boys!?”

Monologue.Current: “Могу я принять ваш заказ?”
Monologue.Original: “May I take your order?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Laguna}{Line}“Как обычно!”
Monologue.Original: Laguna{Line}“The usual!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Kiros}{Line}“Мне тоже”
Monologue.Original: Kiros{Line}“Me, too.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Ward}{Line}“Несите уже!”
Monologue.Original: Ward{Line}“Keep ’em coming!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Ward}{Line}“Итак, {Char Laguna}...{Line} Julia should be making her appearance soon.”
Monologue.Original: Ward{Line}“So, Laguna...{Line} Julia should be making her appearance soon.”

Monologue.Current: Ward{Line}“You goin’ for it tonight?”
Monologue.Original: Ward{Line}“You goin’ for it tonight?”

Monologue.Current: Kiros{Line}“Yeah, go for it!”
Monologue.Original: Kiros{Line}“Yeah, go for it!”

Monologue.Current: Laguna{Line}“What-ever, man!{Line} Can’t you see she’s working?”
Monologue.Original: Laguna{Line}“What-ever, man!{Line} Can’t you see she’s working?”

Monologue.Current: Kiros{Line}“Don’t go back on your word.{Line} C’mon, go wave to her.”
Monologue.Original: Kiros{Line}“Don’t go back on your word.{Line} C’mon, go wave to her.”

Monologue.Current: Laguna{Line}“Give me a break...”
Monologue.Original: Laguna{Line}“Give me a break...”

Monologue.Current: Ward{Line}“So you say,{Line} but we know you’ll do it.”
Monologue.Original: Ward{Line}“So you say,{Line} but we know you’ll do it.”

Monologue.Current: Kiros{Line}“No seats here for a man{Line} who can’t even carry out{Line} a mission like this...”
Monologue.Original: Kiros{Line}“No seats here for a man{Line} who can’t even carry out{Line} a mission like this...”

Monologue.Current: Ward{Line}“Why are you being so quiet?{Line} It’s creepy.”
Monologue.Original: Ward{Line}“Why are you being so quiet?{Line} It’s creepy.”

Monologue.Current: Kiros{Line}“You’re freakin’ out, aren’t ya?”
Monologue.Original: Kiros{Line}“You’re freakin’ out, aren’t ya?”

Monologue.Current: Ward{Line}“You want the whole Galbadian Army{Line} to know what a weenie you are tomorrow?”
Monologue.Original: Ward{Line}“You want the whole Galbadian Army{Line} to know what a weenie you are tomorrow?”

Monologue.Current: Kiros{Line}“C’mon Laguna, go for it!”{Next}“Soldiers like us might never{Line} get another chance...”
Monologue.Original: Kiros{Line}“C’mon Laguna, go for it!”{Next}“Soldiers like us might never{Line} get another chance...”

Monologue.Current: Ward{Line}“Hey, hey. We’re not sayin’ you{Line} should go hit on her or nuthin’.”{Next}“Just get her to notice you.{Line} That’s good enough, eh?”
Monologue.Original: Ward{Line}“Hey, hey. We’re not sayin’ you{Line} should go hit on her or nuthin’.”{Next}“Just get her to notice you.{Line} That’s good enough, eh?”

Monologue.Current: Ward{Line}“Way t’go, Laguna!{Line} Here, here, sit down!”
Monologue.Original: Ward{Line}“Way t’go, Laguna!{Line} Here, here, sit down!”

Monologue.Current: Ward{Line}“Can you really carry on a conversation{Line} with Julia? Make sure the{Line} conversation’s sophisticated.”
Monologue.Original: Ward{Line}“Can you really carry on a conversation{Line} with Julia? Make sure the{Line} conversation’s sophisticated.”

Monologue.Current: Laguna{Line}“No worries, man!{Line} That’s like, my specialty.”
Monologue.Original: Laguna{Line}“No worries, man!{Line} That’s like, my specialty.”

Monologue.Current: Kiros{Line}“One wouldn’t say you converse, though...{Line} All you do is yap-yap-yap and never listen.”
Monologue.Original: Kiros{Line}“One wouldn’t say you converse, though...{Line} All you do is yap-yap-yap and never listen.”

Monologue.Current: Kiros{Line}“Don’t forget to massage your leg.”
Monologue.Original: Kiros{Line}“Don’t forget to massage your leg.”

Monologue.Current: Ward{Line}“It was pretty saaad, seeing you{Line} writhing in pain up there...”
Monologue.Original: Ward{Line}“It was pretty saaad, seeing you{Line} writhing in pain up there...”

Monologue.Current: Laguna{Line}“Don’t say things like that!{Line} What if it really happens!?”
Monologue.Original: Laguna{Line}“Don’t say things like that!{Line} What if it really happens!?”

Monologue.Current: (What the heck is up with this?{Line} {Color Grey}...What the...? What’s going on?{Color White})
Monologue.Original: (What the heck is up with this?{Line} {Color Grey}...What the...? What’s going on?{Color White})

Monologue.Current: (Am I dreaming?{Line} {Color Grey}...This is a dream...This is a dream...{Color White})
Monologue.Original: (Am I dreaming?{Line} {Color Grey}...This is a dream...This is a dream...{Color White})

Monologue.Current: (No, this can’t be a dream!{Line} {Color Grey}This is too weird to be a dream...{Color White})
Monologue.Original: (No, this can’t be a dream!{Line} {Color Grey}This is too weird to be a dream...{Color White})

Monologue.Current: (I always screw up by talking about myself{Line} too much. It’s always been like that.{Line} But not tonight! I’m all ears for Julia!)
Monologue.Original: (I always screw up by talking about myself{Line} too much. It’s always been like that.{Line} But not tonight! I’m all ears for Julia!)

Monologue.Current: (Ahh, time to use my manly charm,{Line} and help Julia with her problem.)
Monologue.Original: (Ahh, time to use my manly charm,{Line} and help Julia with her problem.)

Monologue.Current: ({Color Grey}If this is a dream... Wake up...{Color White})
Monologue.Original: ({Color Grey}If this is a dream... Wake up...{Color White})

Monologue.Current: Kiros{Line}“Good work, Laguna.”
Monologue.Original: Kiros{Line}“Good work, Laguna.”

Monologue.Current: Ward{Line}“Mission successful!”
Monologue.Original: Ward{Line}“Mission successful!”

Monologue.Current: Kiros{Line}“Here, have a seat.”
Monologue.Original: Kiros{Line}“Here, have a seat.”

Monologue.Current: Ward{Line}“I didn’t think you’d actually do it.{Line} Our popularity rating’s gone up a point.”
Monologue.Original: Ward{Line}“I didn’t think you’d actually do it.{Line} Our popularity rating’s gone up a point.”

Monologue.Current: Kiros{Line}“Yeah, but you cut a pretty pitiful{Line} figure up there. I’d say you’re about{Line} a -3 on the manliness scale.”
Monologue.Original: Kiros{Line}“Yeah, but you cut a pretty pitiful{Line} figure up there. I’d say you’re about{Line} a -3 on the manliness scale.”

Monologue.Current: Laguna{Line}“Say what you want!”
Monologue.Original: Laguna{Line}“Say what you want!”

Monologue.Current: Laguna{Line}“(sigh...)”
Monologue.Original: Laguna{Line}“(sigh...)”

Monologue.Current: Laguna{Line}“Julia sure is pretty...”
Monologue.Original: Laguna{Line}“Julia sure is pretty...”

Monologue.Current: Kiros{Line}“Aaa...”
Monologue.Original: Kiros{Line}“Aaa...”

Monologue.Current: Ward{Line}“Hunhhh...?”
Monologue.Original: Ward{Line}“Hunhhh...?”

Monologue.Current: Kiros{Line}“Laguna, we’re takin’ off.”
Monologue.Original: Kiros{Line}“Laguna, we’re takin’ off.”

Monologue.Current: Ward{Line}“It’s on us tonight.{Line} Relax and stay awhile, Laguna.”
Monologue.Original: Ward{Line}“It’s on us tonight.{Line} Relax and stay awhile, Laguna.”

Monologue.Current: Laguna{Line}“H-Hey!{Line} What’s the rush?”
Monologue.Original: Laguna{Line}“H-Hey!{Line} What’s the rush?”

Monologue.Current: Laguna{Line}“Aaaaa...”
Monologue.Original: Laguna{Line}“Aaaaa...”

Monologue.Current: Julia{Line}“May I?”
Monologue.Original: Julia{Line}“May I?”

Monologue.Current: Julia{Line}“Did I interrupt anything?”
Monologue.Original: Julia{Line}“Did I interrupt anything?”

Monologue.Current: Laguna{Line}“N-N-N-Not at all.”
Monologue.Original: Laguna{Line}“N-N-N-Not at all.”

Monologue.Current: Laguna{Line}“P-Please, s-sit down.”
Monologue.Original: Laguna{Line}“P-Please, s-sit down.”

Monologue.Current: (Oh man, oh man, it’s really HER!{Line} What do I do!? Kiros? Ward? HELP!{Line} What do I say!? But man, she is pretty...){Line} {Color Grey}(What’s this guy thinking...?){Color White}
Monologue.Original: (Oh man, oh man, it’s really HER!{Line} What do I do!? Kiros? Ward? HELP!{Line} What do I say!? But man, she is pretty...){Line} {Color Grey}(What’s this guy thinking...?){Color White}

Monologue.Current: {Color Grey}(...Pretty uncomfortable for me.){Color White}
Monologue.Original: {Color Grey}(...Pretty uncomfortable for me.){Color White}

Monologue.Current: Julia{Line}“You ok now?”
Monologue.Original: Julia{Line}“You ok now?”

Monologue.Current: Laguna{Line}“Kind of...”
Monologue.Original: Laguna{Line}“Kind of...”

Monologue.Current: Julia{Line}“How’s your leg?”
Monologue.Original: Julia{Line}“How’s your leg?”

Monologue.Current: Laguna{Line}“L-Leg? Oh, this!?{Line} Y-Yeah, it’s fine.”{Next}“Happens all the time{Line} when I get nervous.(cough)”
Monologue.Original: Laguna{Line}“L-Leg? Oh, this!?{Line} Y-Yeah, it’s fine.”{Next}“Happens all the time{Line} when I get nervous.(cough)”

Monologue.Current: Julia{Line}“Were you nervous?”
Monologue.Original: Julia{Line}“Were you nervous?”

Monologue.Current: Laguna{Line}“Oh, yeah.{Line} I’m still kinda...”
Monologue.Original: Laguna{Line}“Oh, yeah.{Line} I’m still kinda...”

Monologue.Current: Julia{Line}“You can relax.”{Next}“You don’t have to get{Line} nervous around me.”
Monologue.Original: Julia{Line}“You can relax.”{Next}“You don’t have to get{Line} nervous around me.”

Monologue.Current: Laguna{Line}“Oh, sorry.”
Monologue.Original: Laguna{Line}“Oh, sorry.”

Monologue.Current: Julia{Line}“Say...{Line} (Would you like to talk somewhere private?{Line} I have a room here...)”
Monologue.Original: Julia{Line}“Say...{Line} (Would you like to talk somewhere private?{Line} I have a room here...)”

Monologue.Current: Laguna{Line}“I-In your room!?”
Monologue.Original: Laguna{Line}“I-In your room!?”

Monologue.Current: Julia{Line}“Well...”{Next}“(It’s pretty hard to talk freely here.{Line} Everyone’s listening in.)”
Monologue.Original: Julia{Line}“Well...”{Next}“(It’s pretty hard to talk freely here.{Line} Everyone’s listening in.)”

Monologue.Current: Julia{Line}“If you’d like to, please come by.{Line} I’ve been wanting to talk to you.”
Monologue.Original: Julia{Line}“If you’d like to, please come by.{Line} I’ve been wanting to talk to you.”

Monologue.Current: Julia{Line}“You don’t want to?”
Monologue.Original: Julia{Line}“You don’t want to?”

Monologue.Current: Laguna{Line}“Of course I do!”
Monologue.Original: Laguna{Line}“Of course I do!”

Monologue.Current: Julia{Line}“Then I’ll go ahead and wait for you.{Line} Ask for my room at the front desk, ok?”
Monologue.Original: Julia{Line}“Then I’ll go ahead and wait for you.{Line} Ask for my room at the front desk, ok?”

Monologue.Current: (What the heck is up with this?{Line} {Color Grey}...What the...? What’s going on?{Color White})
Monologue.Original: (What the heck is up with this?{Line} {Color Grey}...What the...? What’s going on?{Color White})

Monologue.Original: (Am I dreaming?{Line} {Color Grey}...This is a dream...This is a dream...{Color White})

Monologue.Current: (No, this can’t be a dream!{Line} {Color Grey}This is too weird to be a dream...{Color White})
Monologue.Original: (No, this can’t be a dream!{Line} {Color Grey}This is too weird to be a dream...{Color White})

Monologue.Current: (Julia...? Wants to talk to me...?{Line} {Color Grey}...He talks to himself too much...{Color White})
Monologue.Original: (Julia...? Wants to talk to me...?{Line} {Color Grey}...He talks to himself too much...{Color White})

Monologue.Current: (And just the two of us!{Line} Get it together Laguna... {Color Grey}Whatever{Color White})
Monologue.Original: (And just the two of us!{Line} Get it together Laguna... {Color Grey}Whatever{Color White})

Monologue.Current: (I always screw up by talking about myself{Line} too much. It’s always been like that.{Line} But not tonight! I’m all ears for Julia!)
Monologue.Original: (I always screw up by talking about myself{Line} too much. It’s always been like that.{Line} But not tonight! I’m all ears for Julia!)

Monologue.Current: (Ahh, time to use my manly charm,{Line} and help Julia with her problem.)
Monologue.Original: (Ahh, time to use my manly charm,{Line} and help Julia with her problem.)

Monologue.Current: ({Color Grey}If this is a dream... Wake up...{Color White})
Monologue.Original: ({Color Grey}If this is a dream... Wake up...{Color White})

Monologue.Current: “Just a moment please.”
Monologue.Original: “Just a moment please.”

Monologue.Current: “Excuse me, Laguna.{Line} Please don’t bother{Line} Julia.”
Monologue.Original: “Excuse me, Laguna.{Line} Please don’t bother{Line} Julia.”

Monologue.Current: “Wow, this is turning into{Line} something really special.”
Monologue.Original: “Wow, this is turning into{Line} something really special.”

Monologue.Current: “Солдаты!{Line} МНЕ поручено охранять мисс Джулию.{Line} И я переломаю пальцы первому,{Line} кто протянет к ней свои лапы. ВАМ ЯСНО?!”
Monologue.Original: “Listen up, soldiers.{Line} I’m Julia’s private bodyguard.{Line} Better not make a pass at her.”

Monologue.Current: “Soldiers...{Line} Don’t bother me in my time of bliss...”
Monologue.Original: “Soldiers...{Line} Don’t bother me in my time of bliss...”

Monologue.Current: “Hey soldier...{Line} You got a little too close to Julia...{Line} I’ll get you for that...”
Monologue.Original: “Hey soldier...{Line} You got a little too close to Julia...{Line} I’ll get you for that...”

Monologue.Current: “Pretty bold for just a grunt...{Line} Julia this... Julia that...{Line} Yeah, I’ll fix you...{Line} Send you off to war a million miles away...”
Monologue.Original: “Pretty bold for just a grunt...{Line} Julia this... Julia that...{Line} Yeah, I’ll fix you...{Line} Send you off to war a million miles away...”

Monologue.Current: “Я... ааа... сегодня... назначен{Line} в инженерные войска.{Line} П-приятно познакомиться со всеми вами.”{Next}“Какой радостный день... для меня!{Line} Пожалуйста, не пытайтесь меня остановить...{Line} Я бы хотел предложить тост - за себя!”
Monologue.Original: “I...aah...as of today...{Line} am assigned to the Engineer Corps.{Line} N-Nice to meet you all.”{Next}“What a joyous day for me!{Line} Please everyone, don’t try to stop me...{Line} I would like to propose a toast...to myself!”

Monologue.Current: “To be able to listen to Julia play{Line} on a day like this...”{Next}“Oh baby!{Line} This is turning out to be a lovely night!”
Monologue.Original: “To be able to listen to Julia play{Line} on a day like this...”{Next}“Oh baby!{Line} This is turning out to be a lovely night!”

Monologue.Current: “Today’s my special day.{Line} But...{Line} Julia chose YOU!”{Next}“Why!?{Line} Why must it always be like this!?(hic)”{Next}“And why...must it be{Line} on this day of all days...!?”
Monologue.Original: “Today’s my special day.{Line} But...{Line} Julia chose YOU!”{Next}“Why!?{Line} Why must it always be like this!?(hic)”{Next}“And why...must it be{Line} on this day of all days...!?”

Monologue.Current: (NO WAY...!{Line} I can’t bother Julia!)
Monologue.Original: (NO WAY...!{Line} I can’t bother Julia!)

Monologue.Current: (If I run from this, the guys{Line} will call me a weenie forever.)
Monologue.Original: (If I run from this, the guys{Line} will call me a weenie forever.)

Monologue.Current: (Well, I carried out my mission, so I’ll{Line} be able to report with my head held high.)
Monologue.Original: (Well, I carried out my mission, so I’ll{Line} be able to report with my head held high.)

Monologue.Current: “You saw it in my eyes, didn’t you!?{Line} You’re up for a challenge, right!?”
Monologue.Original: “You saw it in my eyes, didn’t you!?{Line} You’re up for a challenge, right!?”
